question: When was Afrezza approved by the FDA?
ideal_answer: Afrezza was approved by the FDA in June 2014.

snippets.text: In contrary, MannKind Corporation started developing its ultra-rapid-acting insulin Afrezza in a bold bid, probably by managing the issues in which Exubera was not successful. Afrezza has been marketed since February, 2015 by Sanofi after getting FDA approval in June 2014.
